name: ui/dynamic-form
title: Dynamic Form
description: Based on Contact Form 7 definitions. For more info: https://contactform7.com/

formId.name: Form ID
formId.description: The ID of the dynamic form that points to a Contact Form 7 instance.

frameless.name: Frameless
frameless.description: Display the form without a frame.

secondary.name: Secondary
secondary.description: Display secondary variant of the form.
